insights: The Zoom 160 is a made-in-India scooter from an Indian manufacturer, reasonably priced, and designed to be a premium maxi scooter.
The scooter has a unique design, with a big frontal area, tall handlebar, 14-inch wheels, and a fairly large 7-liter fuel tank.
The Zoom 160 features a liquid-cooled engine, a rotary dial for convenient use, and remote access for opening the boot.
The scooter has a spacious and comfortable riding position, with a low seat height of below 800 mm, and a provision to move feet around.
The Zoom 160 has a keyless feature, allowing riders to remotely open the boot, and a USB port for convenience.
The scooter is accessible to riders of various heights, with a seat height of 787 mm and a sloping seat that allows for comfortable riding.
